memberdef.argsstring: (ITextEditorService textEditorService, LuthetusTextEditorConfig textEditorConfig, IStorageService storageService, CommonBackgroundTaskApi commonBackgroundTaskApi, IDispatcher dispatcher)
memberdef.name: TextEditorOptionsApi

briefdescription.para: One should store the result of invoking this method in a variable, then reference that variable. If one continually invokes this, there is no guarantee that the data had not changed since the previous invocation.

This is setting the TextEditor's theme specifically. This is not to be confused with the AppOptions Themes which get applied at an application level.
This allows for a "DarkTheme-Application" that has a "LightTheme-TextEditor".
